00037 $WebworkSOAP::SeedCE{soap_authen_key} = "123456789123456789";

00040 
00041 sub new {
00042     my($self,$authenKey,$courseName) = @_;
00043     $self = {};
00044     #Construct Course
00045     my $ce = eval { new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({%SeedCE, courseName => $courseName }) };
00046     $@ and soap_fault_major("Course Environment cannot be constructed.<br>$@");
00047     #Authentication Check
00048     if($ce->{soap_authen_key} != $authenKey) {
00049         soap_fault_authen();
00050     }
00051     #Construct DB handle
00052     my $db = eval { new WeBWorK::DB($ce->{dbLayout}); };
00053     $@ and soap_fault_major("Failed to initialize database handle.<br>$@");
00054     $self->{db} = $db;
00055     $self->{ce} = $ce;
00056     bless $self;
00057     return $self;
00058 }
00059 
00060 sub array_to_soap_string {
00061     my @array = @_;
00062     @array = map { SOAP::Data->type( 'string', $_ ) } @array;
00063     return \@array;
00064 }
00065 
00066 sub soap_fault_authen {
00067     die SOAP::Fault->faultcode(SOAPERROR_AUTHEN_FAILED)
00068                     ->faultstring("SOAP Webservice Authentication Failed!");
00069 }
00070 
00071 sub soap_fault {
00072     my ($errorCode,$errorMsg) = @_;
00073     die SOAP::Fault->faultcode($errorCode)
00074                    ->faultstring($errorMsg);
00075 }
00076 
00077 sub soap_fault_major {
00078     my ($errorMsg) = @_;
00079     soap_fault(SOAPERROR_MAJOR,$errorMsg);
00080 }

00103 sub list_courses {
00104     my ($self,$authenKey) = @_;
00105     my $ce = eval { new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({%WeBWorK::SeedCE })};
00106     $@ and soap_fault_major("Internal Course Environment cannot be constructed.");
00107     if($authenKey != $WebworkSOAP::SeedCE{soap_authen_key}) {
00108         soap_fault_authen;
00109     }
00110     $@ and soap_fault_major("Course Environment cannot be constructed.");
00111     my @test = listCourses($ce);
00112     return array_to_soap_string( @test );
00113 }

00115 =pod

00117 _IN authenKey $string
00118 _IN courseName $string
00119 _IN userID $string
00120 _RETURN $string
00121 =end WSDL
00122 =cut
00123 sub login_user {
00124     my ($self,$authenKey,$courseName,$userID) = @_;
00125     my $soapEnv = new WebworkSOAP($authenKey,$courseName);
00126     my $newKey;
00127     my $timestamp = time;
00128     my @chars = @{ $soapEnv->{ce}->{sessionKeyChars} };
00129     my $length = $soapEnv->{ce}->{sessionKeyLength};
00130     srand;
00131     $newKey = join ("", @chars[map rand(@chars), 1 .. $length]);
00132     my $Key = $soapEnv->{db}->newKey(user_id=>$userID, key=>$newKey, timestamp=>$timestamp);
00133     eval { $soapEnv->{db}->deleteKey($userID) };
00134     eval { $soapEnv->{db}->addKey($Key) };
00135     $@ and soap_fault(SOAPERROR_USER_NOT_FOUND,"User not found.");
00136     return SOAP::Data->type( 'string', $newKey );
00137 }

00148 sub assign_set_to_user {
00149     my ($self,$authenKey,$courseName,$userID,$setID) = @_;
00150     my $soapEnv = new WebworkSOAP($authenKey,$courseName);
00151     my $GlobalSet = eval {$soapEnv->{db}->getGlobalSet($setID)};
00152     $@ and soap_fault(SOAPERROR_SET_NOT_FOUND,"Set not found.");
00153     my $setID = $GlobalSet->set_id;
00154     my $db = $soapEnv->{db};
00155     my $UserSet = $db->newUserSet;
00156     $UserSet->user_id($userID);
00157     $UserSet->set_id($setID);
00158     my @results;
00159     my $set_assigned = 0;
00160     eval { $db->addUserSet($UserSet) };
00161     if ($@) {
00162         if ($@ =~ m/user set exists/) {
00163             push @results, "set $setID is already assigned to user $userID.";
00164             $set_assigned = 1;
00165         } else {
00166             die $@;
00167         }
00168     }
00169 
00170     my @GlobalProblems = grep { defined $_ } $db->getAllGlobalProblems($setID);
00171     foreach my $GlobalProblem (@GlobalProblems) {
00172         my $seed = int( rand( 2423) ) + 36;
00173         my $UserProblem = $db->newUserProblem;
00174     $UserProblem->user_id($userID);
00175     $UserProblem->set_id($GlobalProblem->set_id);
00176     $UserProblem->problem_id($GlobalProblem->problem_id);
00177     initializeUserProblem($UserProblem, $seed);
00178     eval { $db->addUserProblem($UserProblem) };
00179     }
00180     return array_to_soap_string( @results ); #FIXME WSDL says $string, not @string?
00181 }

00226 sub get_set_data {
00227     my ($self,$authenKey,$courseName,$setID) = @_;
00228     my $soapEnv = new WebworkSOAP($authenKey,$courseName);
00229     my $setData = $soapEnv->{db}->getGlobalSet($setID);
00230     if(not defined $setData) {
00231         return -1;
00232     }
00233     my $set = new WebworkSOAP::Classes::GlobalSet($setData);
00234     return $set;
00235 }

00296 sub get_passwords {
00297     my ($self,$authenKey,$courseName,$userIDs) = @_;

00299     my @passwordData = $soapEnv->{db}->getPasswords(@$userIDs);
00300     my @passwords;
00301     for(my $i=0;$i<@passwordData;$i++) {

00385 sub get_permissions {
00386     my ($self,$authenKey,$courseName,$userIDs) = @_;
00387     my $soapEnv = new WebworkSOAP($authenKey,$courseName);
00388     my @permissionData = $soapEnv->{db}->getPermissionLevels(@$userIDs);
00389     my @permissions;
00390     for(my $i=0;$i<@permissionData;$i++) {
00391         push(@permissions,new WebworkSOAP::Classes::Permission(@permissionData[$i]));
00392     }
00393     return \@permissions;

00656 sub get_all_global_sets {

01089 
01090 ###########################################
01091 # grading utilties -- to be moved to Utils::Grades
01092 ############################################
01093 
01094 ############################################
01095 # get_wwassignment_grade_for_one ($db $userID $setID);
01096 #input  $userID, $setID (or a UserSet record)?
01097 #output set grade for a homework problem or maximum grade for a gateway problem with several set versions
01098 ############################################
01099 sub get_wwassignment_grade_for_one_user{
01100     my($db, $userID, $setID) = @_;
01101     my $user_set = $db->getMergedSet($userID,$setID);
01102     print LOG "user $userID set $setID user_set ".ref($user_set)."\n";
01103     return " " unless ref($user_set);  # return a blank grade if there is no user_set
01104     warn " user $userID $setID ".ref($user_set)."\n";
01105     my $setIsVersioned = ( defined($user_set->assignment_type) && $user_set->assignment_type =~ /gateway/)?1:0;
01106     my @setVersions=();
01107     if ( $setIsVersioned ) { 
01108         my @vList = $db->listSetVersions($userID,$setID);
01109         # we have to have the merged set versions to 
01110         #    know what each of their assignment types 
01111         #    are (because proctoring can change)
01112         @setVersions = $db->getMergedSetVersions( map {[$userID, $setID, $_]} @vList );
01113 
01114         # add the set versions to our list of sets
01115 #       foreach ( @setVersions ) { 
01116 #           $setsByID{$_->set_id . ",v" . $_->version_id} = $_; 
01117 #       }
01118 #       # flag the existence of set versions for this set
01119 #       $setVersionsByID{$setName} = [ @vList ];
01120 #       # and save the set names for display
01121 #       push( @allSetIDs, $setName );
01122 #       push( @allSetIDs, map { "$setName,v$_" } @vList );
01123 
01124     } else {
01125 #       push( @allSetIDs, $setName );
01126 #       $setVersionsByID{$setName} = "None";
01127     }
01128     my $grade;
01129     if ($setIsVersioned) {
01130         if (@setVersions) {
01131             $grade =0;
01132             foreach my $setVersion (@setVersions) {  # get highest grade among versions
01133                 #print LOG "getting set $userID $setID version:".ref($setVersion)."\n";
01134                 my $current_grade = get_set_grade_for_UserSet($db, $setVersion);
01135                 $grade = $current_grade if $current_grade > $grade;
01136                 
01137             }
01138                 
01139         } else {
01140             $grade = " ";
01141         }
01142     } else {  # not versioned
01143         $grade = get_set_grade_for_UserSet($db, $user_set); 
01144     }
01145     $grade;   # return grade
01146 }
01147     
01148 ############################################
01149 # get_set_grade_for_UserSet ($db, $user_set);
01150 #input  $userID, $setID (UserSet record);
01151 #output set grade for a homework problem or a single  set version of a gateway quiz
01152 ############################################
01153 
01154 sub get_set_grade_for_UserSet{
01155     my $db = shift;
01156     my $user_set = shift;
01157     warn "get_set_grade_for_UserSet(db, user_set); an argument is missing db: $db user_set $user_set" 
01158         unless ref($db) =~ /DB/  and ref($user_set) =~/Set/;
01159     my $setIsVersioned = ( defined( $user_set->assignment_type() ) 
01160          && $user_set->assignment_type() =~ /gateway/ )? 1:0;
01161     my @problemData=();
01162     print LOG "get_set_grade_for_UserSet: getting set ".$user_set->set_id." "." for ".$user_set->user_id."\n";
01163     if ($setIsVersioned) {  
01164         @problemData = $db->getAllMergedProblemVersions( $user_set->user_id, $user_set->set_id, $user_set->version_id ) if $user_set->can('version_id');
01165     } else {
01166         @problemData = $db->getAllMergedUserProblems($user_set->user_id, $user_set->set_id);
01167     }
01168         
01169         my $grade = 0;
01170         for(my $i=0;$i<@problemData;$i++) {
01171                 #print LOG "$userID problem Data",join(" ", %{$problemData[$i]}),"\n\n";
01172                 $grade += ($problemData[$i]->status)*($problemData[$i]->value);
01173                 #print LOG "grade is $grade\n";
01174         }
01175     return $grade;
01176 }
01177 1;
